title: DDFP 601: Week 3 recap & Who will win the AFC South?
itunes:title: DDFP 601: Week 3 recap & Who will win the AFC South?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew and Colleen Wolfe to recap the biggest storylines from Week 3 of NFL action, notably whether or not the Patriots have some serious flaws and who will win the AFC South? Also, Ike Taylor joins to preview the Steelers' matchup against their AFC North rival Ravens. Plus, in this week's edition of the Q and A, the group answers questions from Vikings CB Xavier Rhodes, Packers TE Martellus Bennett, NFL S Will Blackmon and some loyal members of the Shek Republic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
